data.title: YCESA Professional Staff Directory
data.text:
Accreditation

YCESA and its affiliated schools (Yavapai County Juvenile Detention School and Yavapai County Accommodation District) is the first Arizona education service agency to earn a systems-wide accreditation by Cognia and to embark on its continuous improvement plan. This blue ribbon seal of approval is the result of a rigorous internal self-examination and a 4-day evaluation by a professional Cognia external review team. The power of accreditation is as a conduit to a successful continual improvement model, strategic planning, empowerment of staff, and thoughtful data-based dialogue and decision-making.

Accessibility Statement

At the Yavapai County Education Service Agency, we strive to make our website accessible to the widest possible audience. If you have trouble accessing our website or would like to share any feedback, please donâ€™t hesitate to contact us. You may also view our full Web Accessibility Statement.
